text:
"Mortal Kombat" is a fighting video game. It was developed by NetherRealm Studios and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. It is the ninth main game in the "Mortal Kombat" series.
The game was released on April 3, 2011 for the PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, and Microsoft Windows.
Development.
The energy meter allows the player to use techniques like the brutal X-Ray moves, with some refinements made to their system.
